item.title: The Gods of Sinath Lonn
item.author: blog@lordyod.com
item.dc:creator: Lord Yod
item.description: One of the major differences between traditional D&D and my science fantasy homebrew setting is the nature of divine magic. A big part of this is the relationship between mortals and the gods. In settings such as the Forgotten Realms or Greyhawk, divine magic comes from the gods themselves. That isn’t the case in Sinath Lonn.
